message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I really appreciate it, but $120 is a bit more than I'm comfortable paying.  I'd be willing to pay $90 for it.  What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $120 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Alice, $110 is still a bit more than I'm hoping to spend.  How about we split the difference and I pay you $100 for it?  That way we both get a good deal.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob! However, I'm not willing to go all the way down to $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and sell it to you for $105.
